name: zootils
description: A utility library written in Typscript

scripts.build-patch: npm version patch && tsc && vite build && typedoc && npm run copy-dist
scripts.build-minor: npm version minor && tsc && vite build && typedoc && npm run copy-dist
scripts.build-major: npm version major && tsc && vite build && typedoc && npm run copy-dist
scripts.copy-dist: copy-file README.md --folder dist && copy-file LICENSE.md --folder dist && copy-file package.json --folder dist

author: Donovan Harshbarger
